title: Gallery Conversation: Chicago Stories (July 21)
hero_caption: Barnett Newman. Lace Curtain for Mayor Daley, 1968. Gift of Annalee Newman. © 2018 Barnett Newman Foundation / Artists Rights Society (ARS), New York.
short_description: Join us to discover works across the museum with unique Chicago connections and histories.
list_description: Join us to discover works across the museum with unique Chicago connections and histories.
description:
Join museum educators for a gallery tour that highlights the unique Chicago connections and histories across the museum. We’ll look at paintings, sculptures, and architecture/design created by hometown legends and consider how Chicago has influenced artists near and far.

If you have any questions about programming, please reach out to museum-programs@artic.edu. For questions related to accessibility accommodations, please email access@artic.edu. 

Please note that in-person tours may be canceled or postponed due to unforeseen circumstances.
